Pre-Game Insights: The match was at risk due to the weather forecast, with an 85% chance of rain on Saturday.
India could test their bench strength, potentially giving Kuldeep Yadav or Sanju Samson a game.
Virat Kohli's last chance to find form before the Super Eight stage.
Aaron Johnson, Canada's second highest run-scorer, was in good form with 52 against Pakistan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the match being abandoned without a ball bowled.
India had played the same XI in their first three group games.
Rohit Sharma is the top-scorer in T20Is at Lauderhill with 196 runs.
Arshdeep Singh had a strong performance with 7 wickets in 4 innings.
Others: Canada had never faced India in a T20I before this match.
